Text: Hey, thanks!  I've heard about this audio book; it's a dramatic reading by Charlton Heston of AC/DC songs.  I hope it's as good as his "Cop Killer"

@ 'zmacdaddy8' shut the fuck up. With a name like that I imagine you must be some fucking white trash wannabe nigger gangsta. This is classic rock and it'll be around long after the shit you listen to is gone.
